title: Capitalism: God Wants You To Be Rich
description: In the New Testament, Jesus says it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of God. In the United States today, many Christians believe in something radically different.  In what's known as the prosperity gospel, wealth is a sign of virtue and God's favor.  The effects of this belief can be seen throughout American life from business to politics to social policy.
